title: civil control
description: Anyone who renounces responsibility also renounces the decision
description_hu: Aki lemond a felelősségről, az lemond a döntés jogáról is.
description_full: Politics, just like corporations, have their own perspectives. Politics, just like corporations, must be kept away from breaking with humanity, generosity and responsibility—for their self-serving goals. “Thou shalt not be indifferent.”
